os.description: Identificator of the system, depending on the provider (often image name).

provider.description: One of [openstack, beaker, openshift, rhev, ANY_OTHER_PROVIDER]

architecture.description: Architecture of the system/distro used for testing. Examples include x86_64, ppc64le, s390x, aarch64.

variant.description: The compose or image variant, if application. Examples include Server and Workstation
